## Source: amazon-inspector (4da96ce055040828362e8a000e3ad2e1a1647b7d3faa0c4383c260d6044bef7d)
The package node-calculator-cf8c was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c9c84dee863fae35e3837b12bae394f4762d2ed613ce10bf6cef759c45533c66)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'node-calculator-cf8c' @ 2.1.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
